name: Silvar
description: This bike is really good for the money. With all the mixed reviews, I didn't know what to expect, and when I saw the box was a bit beat up I was a bit concerned.

name: Gold
description: I got the bike to start cycling. It was easy to put together and for starting off its not bad at all. It looks good and its fun to ride.

name: Diamond
description: I purchased this bike back in March to commute to work 17 miles a day round trip in NYC. In honesty, I bought this as a quick fix to taking the subway during
